Transcription for 546187

My Little Channel
and peace.
Marquise, for your love,
and for your total love,
God is our God, our God, our God,
Lord, let me serve thee God,
O Lord, let me serve thee God,
for my love is your love.
The cross of Eve, the air of duty,
the holy ground, the food of birth,
and the cross of the Lord,
the cross of the Lord,
let me serve thee God,
for my love is your love,
for my love is your love,
for my love is your love,
for my love is your love,
for my love is your love.
